questions.question: How do I add video to a page?
questions.answer: Call `addOnUISdk.app.document.addVideo(blob)` with a video blob object.

questions.question: What parameter does addVideo require?
questions.answer: Only a Blob object containing the video data.

questions.question: How do I get video as a blob?
questions.answer: Use `fetch(videoUrl).then(r => r.blob())` to convert video files to blob format.

questions.question: Can I use local video files?
questions.answer: Yes, use relative paths from add-on root with fetch() to load local video files.

questions.question: Can I use remote video URLs?
questions.answer: Yes, fetch remote video URLs and convert to blob before adding to document.

questions.question: What video formats are supported?
questions.answer: Refer to Adobe Express file format requirements page for supported video formats and size limits.

questions.question: How do I handle video loading errors?
questions.answer: Use try/catch blocks around fetch() and addVideo() calls to handle loading failures.
